response.overview: This story is about a poor man who is not able to marry his daughter due to lack of money. To get the daughter of that poor father married, the greedy Pandit of the village tries to get her married to a rich old man. The helpless heroine Rani Chatterjee is married to a feeble minded man whose father is a rich man. Harassment by her father-in-law and the landowner of the village makes the heroin Rani Chatterjee, Chandi. What Rani Chatterjee does as Chandi in the fire of vengeance! Watch the film.
response.title: Chandi
